title: Shuffle card
data:
{{Obsolete}} The Shuffle card rearranges the player's natural stat values. For example, if the player's natural stats are Str 28, Int 5, and Dex 10, then after a Shuffle the player might have Str 10, Int 28, and Dex 5.
